images.copyright: Container ship near a commercial port in Thailand (© Suriyapong Thongsawang/Getty Images)
images.title: Aye aye, captain!
images.caption: World Maritime Day
images.desc: The sea is a tough workplace, and a busy one—the shipping industry is the backbone of the global economy, transporting more than 80% of the world’s trade. On World Maritime Day, shipping professionals and leaders gather to raise awareness about maritime safety, sustainable shipping practices, and pollution. Organized by the International Maritime Organization, a UN agency, the day also honors maritime workers. These unsung heroes work long hours and spend months away from family to keep our trade flowing.
